intent: Perform full-spectrum optimization, validation, and deployment finalization of the JITUME portfolio website.
objectives: Complete all pending deployment steps (Formspree ID, canonical domain, analytics).
Raise Lighthouse scores to 95+ across all categories.
Automate build, lint, and deploy workflow using Windsurf pipelines.
Implement scalable structure with maintainable modular CSS/JS.

phases.name: Phase 1: Codebase Audit
actions: Run HTMLHint, Stylelint, and ESLint across all files.
Perform Lighthouse and WAVE accessibility scans.
Detect and list all unused CSS selectors and JS imports.
Check for missing schema markup, OpenGraph, and canonical tags.
Produce audit.json summary with error severity scoring.

phases.name: Phase 2: Optimization and Refactor
actions: Minify HTML, CSS, and JS (preserve readability comments).
Bundle JS using ESBuild or Rollup with tree-shaking.
Apply image optimization pipeline (WebP + AVIF).
Implement service worker for caching and offline support.
Add modular structure for animations (GSAP controllers).
Throttle scroll/animation listeners for better mobile FPS.

phases.name: Phase 3: SEO, Accessibility, and Analytics
actions: Ensure all meta tags and schema.org structured data are present.
Add Twitter Card and OpenGraph data for sharing.
Integrate Google Analytics (GA4) with consent banner.
Run WCAG AA validation and patch any missing aria roles.
Generate sitemap.xml and robots.txt dynamically.

phases.name: Phase 4: Form & Integration Finalization
actions: Inject provided Formspree ID into contact form.
Validate async submission flow (success/failure).
Add honeypot and timeout-based spam defense.
Ensure visual feedback for loading, success, and error states.

phases.name: Phase 5: Deployment Pipeline
actions: Create GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline (lint + build + deploy).
Add pre-deploy checks: link integrity, broken assets, console errors.
Configure hosting (Netlify or Vercel) with enforced HTTPS and redirect rules.
Enable versioned static assets and cache busting.
Integrate Sentry for runtime error tracking.
phases.commit_policy: merge to main after CI success

phases.name: Phase 6: Validation and Reporting
actions: Run post-deploy Lighthouse audit.
Compare performance and bundle size deltas.
Validate form functionality on live domain.
Export final_report.json summarizing improvements.
Generate CHANGELOG.md with timestamps.
